jinhsi.name: Jinhsi
jinhsi.ability_description: If other Cubes are stacked on top of Jinhsi, there is a 40% chance she will move to the top of the stack.

changli.name: Changli
changli.ability_description: If other Cubes are stacked below Changli, there is a 65% chance she will be the last to move in the next turn.

calcharo.name: Calcharo
calcharo.ability_description: If Calcharo is ranked last, he advances 3 extra pads.

shorekeeper.name: Shorekeeper
shorekeeper.ability_description: The dice will only roll a 2 or 3.

camellya.name: Camellya
camellya.ability_description: There is a 50% chance of triggering this effect on Camellya's turn. For every other Cube on the same pad besides Camellya, she advances 1 extra pad, while the other Cubes stay in place.

carlotta.name: Carlotta
carlotta.ability_description: There is a 28% chance to advance twice with the rolled number.

roccia.name: Roccia
roccia.ability_description: If Roccia is the last to move, she advances 2 extra pads.

brant.name: Brant
brant.ability_description: If Brant is the first to move, he advances 2 extra pads.

cantarella.name: Cantarella
cantarella.ability_description: The first time Cantarella passes by other Cubes, she stacks with them and carries them forward.

zani.name: Zani
zani.ability_description: The dice will only roll a 1 or 3. When moving with other Cubes stacking above, there is a 40% chance to advance 2 extra pads next turn.

cartethyia.name: Cartethyia
cartethyia.ability_description: If ranked last after own action, there is a 60% chance to advance 2 extra pads in all remaining turns. This can only be triggered once in each match.

phoebe.name: Phoebe
phoebe.ability_description: There is a 50% chance to advance an extra pad.
